title: Get 60% OFF the TicWatch Pro 5 Right Now!
description: It comes with a durable design in addition to useful features which make it a nice Wear OS option. The post Get 60% OFF the TicWatch Pro 5 Right Now! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It comes with a durable design in addition to useful features which make it a nice Wear OS option.
text: When it comes to affordable Wear OS watches, the TicWatch Pro 5 is one of the more capable options on the market, especially when compared to competing models from more “popular” brands. It comes with a durable design in addition to useful features which make it a nice alternative for users after looking for a reasonably-priced and feature-packed Wear OS device. It’s also cheaper right now, going for just around $140. Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!) The TicWatch Pro 5 comes with a solid specs sheet, which includes a 1.43-inch AMOLED screen with Gorilla Glass, a Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1 Wearable Platform, as well as a generally-sturdy design. it also runs on Google’s Wear OS, with access to a ton of different apps from Google and third party developers. Other features include an Accelerometer, Gyro Sensor, Heart Rate Sensor, SpO2 Sensor, Skin Temperature Sensor, Low Latency Off-Body Sensor, a Barometer, and a Compass. html:
When it comes to affordable Wear OS watches, the TicWatch Pro 5 is one of the more capable options on the market, especially when compared to competing models from more “popular” brands. It comes with a durable design in addition to useful features which make it a nice alternative for users after looking for a reasonably-priced and feature-packed Wear OS device. It’s also cheaper right now, going for just around $140.

Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!)

The TicWatch Pro 5 comes with a solid specs sheet, which includes a 1.43-inch AMOLED screen with Gorilla Glass, a Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1 Wearable Platform, as well as a generally-sturdy design. it also runs on Google’s Wear OS, with access to a ton of different apps from Google and third party developers. Other features include an Accelerometer, Gyro Sensor, Heart Rate Sensor, SpO2 Sensor, Skin Temperature Sensor, Low Latency Off-Body Sensor, a Barometer, and a Compass.
